recipe.title: Meatball Sub Bake Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Cut each refrigerated biscuit into 8 pieces. Place in a greased 9x13 inch (23x33 cm) baking dish.
Pour on the sauce, and stir to coat all sides of the biscuits.
Place the meatballs on top of the mixture.
Top with the shredded cheese, and bake for 35 minutes.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Cut each refrigerated biscuit into 8 pieces.
